item.title: Apollo, Workday shares rally on news they’ll join S&P 500. Their fortunes have differed this year.
item.description: Shares of investment firm Apollo Global Management and workplace cloud-services platform Workday rallied after hours on Friday, after S&P Dow Jones In...

item.title: ‘I want to enjoy the rest of my years’: I’m 65, retired and own my home. I have $300,000 to invest. What should I do with it?
GameStop’s stock is trading at a level that ignores the company’s challenges, says Wedbush
item.description: The videogame retailer’s shares jumped following the latest cryptic post from influential trader Keith Gill, aka “Roaring Kitty.”

item.title: What does Trump really think about Social Security?
item.description: Trump has promised to protect Social Security and Medicare, but lots of his fellow Republicans appear to have other ideas.

item.title: My ex-husband is worth 10 times what I’m worth. Is it fair that we contribute equally to our son’s college education?
item.description: “When I suggested I now want to pay less, my former spouse said he didn’t want to finance my savings.”
